discourse_list.title: DGD Burn Vote results: voted down, many unrevealed votes

content.content: Do link any and other other relevant analysis and commentary. While the speculation in motive is strong here, the data/research has checked out so far to my level of understanding.   twitter.com    찌 G 跻 じ MBA, CFA, FRM, CFP, NGMI, HFSP, HENTAI (DegenSpartan)  0/ long thread on the recent @DigixGlobal $DGD to ETH burn proposal that has just ended.  i'll try to make the first bit as factual as possible and leave my bias towards the end.  so, what is this vote about and why is it important? https://t.co/ZhFmi0EFVo         9:16 AM - 27 Aug 2019     120          42            If the vote had passed an interesting collateral concern/relationship would have arisen in that the burn penalty would roughly peg the net present value of a vote to an amount of ETH. Unburned NAV = ETH + Vote Burned NAV = ETH - Burn Penalty DGD Vote = Burn Penalty
